i18n.key: List of top-level shelves that will be online in the shop.
position of the currency symbol when displaying an amount, for instance: to the right 19.99 €, to the left € 19.99.

When no visual element is available for the product, this visual element will be used to display the product details. If left empty, the default visual element for products set in the preferences of the Catalogue and Shop modules will be used.

When no visual element is available for the product, this visual element will be used to display the product in the lists. If left empty, the default visual element for products set in the preferences of the Catalogue and Shops module will be used.
Allows the display of products on the website when they are out of stock.
allow ordering of out of stock products
If checked, customers will be allowed to order products that are out of stock. This field is only available if display of out of stock products is activated.
The default number of products per page in the shop's product lists in frontoffice.
Time during which a new availability alert will stay active.
"zone" document of the "Zones" module that will be used to validate the billing addresses during the ordering process.
Select a tax area to enable entering prices incl. taxes in backoffice.
Currency used by the shop. It comes from a static list in the "Lists" module.
Tax area used by default for the shop
If set to "yes", the price excl. taxes will be displayed on the websites (this option can be used in addition to Display the price incl. taxes).
If set to "yes", the price incl. taxes will be displayed on the websites (this option can be used in addition to Display the price excl. taxes).
Activates or deactivates the possibility for visitors to place an alert on the availability of a product
When activating the CAPTCHA, it will be shown to non logged-in users, logged-in users will not see it.
enable or disable comments on products
Activates or deactivates the possibility for visitors to place an alert on the price drop of a product.
Date from which the shop will no longer be publishable.
There can only be one default shop per website and per language for a given period of time.
text field used both on the websites and in the administration interface to identify the shop.
Website or website topic in which the system topic associated with the shop will be created. Usually, this is the website in which the shop is put online.
The page description used in the meta tags of the shop homepage.
The page keywords used in the meta tags of the shop homepage.
The page title used in the meta tags of the shop homepage.
duration of the price drop alerts
The time during which a new price drop alert stays active.
The date from which the shop will be publishable.
